index.title: About - Trailstone
index.description: TrailStone was formed in April 2013 and is a group of separate companies, each staffed by energy and finance professionals with in-depth experience of mining, oil and gas

experience.title: Experience - Trailstone
experience.description: The senior TrailStone partners are Bill Gebhardt, Raymond Key, Troy Martin, John Redpath and David Silbert
